channel.title: LaTeX on Adam Coding Corner
channel.description: Recent content in LaTeX on Adam Coding Corner

item.title: IntelliJ IDEA as a LaTeX editor
item.description: IntelliJ IDEA is pretty good at handling LaTeX. I dare say that it is an even better experience than TexStudio or Texmaker, which are dedicated to this type of project. However, the strength of IntelliJ is not in its out-of-the-box capabilities, but plugins and manual configuration of the build process.
